Summary: i have the aliens (green staff) in side my body
divs: Sighting DetailsIn 1990 I was in Morocco. The last week of March, sandy after midnight, I was in the country area. I saw a yellow square Air Craft was landed front of me about 20 meters with a bright yellow headlight. Its size it was 6 meters or seven meters square, it���s HGT it was 2 meters. It Came 2 meters close to me in my left side. I also saw two Flying dishes stand and stay 6 meters over me, one over one space between them at least one meter. The Flying Dishes Started to shine a bright white light on me for 5 - 10 min. then I heard somebody talked to me A pure Arabic language for 2-3 min, this voice from the flying dishes I thought they were Angeles. The square a yellow air craft made an injection in my body because suddenly I was unconscious. After 3 or 4 hours I found my self same place but every thing was gone But I felt some thing in my body .For four years I saw them only at night. They would try to throw me into black holes. Now I realize that they are not angeles , they are aliens . So when I was unconscious they made in my body the aliens (green staff).after realizing This, I left sraghna and I went to the city Casablanca. Two years later, I came to United States of America. Last December suddenly I lost my hearing of left ear until now. Instill hear them and they torture me until today.
